thread.section_title: Rydges Kensington London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly and central
thread.title_full: Friendly and central - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Tony S
title: Friendly and central
text: We went on a travelzoo deal. Booked a Queen room which was quite small. Would be difficult to swing a cat, but clean and a good central location. I'd go for a king room if you're planning on swinging a cat. Travelzoo offer a free glass of wine! But it did put hairs on your chest so beware. Restaurant staff very slow in the morning. Other than that, well managed by friendly blonde Australians, definitely worth a stay.
